name: Hotline Bilibid
description:
Hotline BIlibid is a simple 2d shooting game and your goal is to simply survive as long as you can. Shoot evil cats before they eliminate you. You only have 3 lives before they completely take you down. 


Made by: Maelynn Joyce Clarisse Dulay, Jacob Esclamado, Jolo Gutierrez, Russell Phillip Melendrez,  John Karlo Mendoza, Sean Paolo Ramos, Kyle Raphael Santos
